title: (x) Pank Pages - Eurostile Ext {Grant}
content: It appears to be [Eurostile Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124239/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/extended-2/testdrive.html?s=PANKPAGES&p=60), perhaps tweaked and/or stretched a bit.
author: grant

comments.content:
Guest, this is the second time asking about Photoshop questions. Try visiting [www.photoshopusers.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124239/http:/www.photoshopusers.com/)   
   
Type questions here, photoshop questions there
There is also a newsgroup which I recall posting before when someone wanted to know Photoshop skills. It's alt.graphics.photoshop. There is also one for Illustrator.
